price: To, don me, a lõkacin da tsananin Mu ya jẽ musu ba su yi tawãlu'i ba? Kuma amma zukatansu sun ƙẽƙashe kuma shaiɗan yã ƙawãta musu abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.
arabic: فَلَوۡلَآ إِذۡ جَآءَهُم بَأۡسُنَا تَضَرَّعُواْ وَلَٰكِن قَسَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falawlā idh jāahum basunā taḍarraʿū walākin qasat qulūbuhum wazayyana lahumu al-shayṭānu mā kānū yaʿmalūna
